description:
Being smart with your marketing ensures the success of your business by attracting more customers, and keeping them coming back.

In this course you will learn how to;

  • Target the preferred writers/reporters for your business
  • Utilize social media for your free PR
  • Choose carefully exactly what you want to showcase
  • Which social media vehicles work best for attracting relevant media coverage
  • Which tools bring the media to you
  • Scope out which writers/reporters are most likely to write about your business

...and much more.

The 'How to Get Free Publicity for Your Small Business' course is a basic introduction to the 10 steps to getting valuable media attention for your business without forking out a ton of cash. It is structured as a video presentation.
title: How to Get Free Publicity for Your Small Business
